snippet.title: Great Houses of Calderia - Founders Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy Great Houses of Calderia on Steam in Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910/Great_Houses_of_Calderia/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=&utm_campaign=&utm_content=Founders_trailer

Great Houses of Calderia is a single-player Grand Strategy game set in the fantastic land of Calderia inspired by the Renaissance. Focusing on unique choices and real-time resources management, run an entire House and interact with your family to successfully form diplomatic relationships with neighboring Houses.

Great Houses of Calderia:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812910?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=founderstrailer&utm_medium=web
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/GreatHousesOfCalderia
Twitter - https://twitter.com/CalderiaGame
Official website - https://calderiagames.com

Firesquid:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/FiresquidGames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/FiresquidGames
Official website - https://www.firesquid.fr

Resistance Games:
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/resistancegames
Twitter - https://twitter.com/GamesResistance
Official website - https://resistancegames.com

--------------------------------------------

Music:
Great Houses of Calderia Theme
Janne Kariniemi & Seppo Kantonen

Voice actress:
Louise Saint-Claire

Trailer:
Suzanne Wallace (Indie Bard)
https://www.indiebard.co
